title: Brain Tumor Zero Hit Investigation
finding: Brain tumor low precision is due to DRKG DRUG COVERAGE GAP, not model failure

key_results.root_cause: Brain-specific drugs NOT in DRKG embeddings

evidence.gt_coverage: 51 brain tumor GT entries with 27 unique drugs
evidence.drkg_coverage: Only 1063 CHEBI compounds in DRKG, Temozolomide not among them
evidence.prediction_analysis: Model predicts generic chemo (Cisplatin, Fluorouracil) instead of brain-specific drugs

structural_issue.description: DRKG lacks brain tumor-specific drugs like Temozolomide, so kNN cannot recommend them
structural_issue.requires: External drug-disease data or manual rule addition

recommendation.production: Exclude brain tumors from confidence tiers OR add manual rules for known drugs
recommendation.future: Consider integrating additional drug databases with better brain tumor coverage
